( "OUTER-WORLD"-Solutions ? ) → DISTANCE → ONE-PERSON-INTENDED MODULAR-&-SCALEABLEE SOLUTION-SETUP → NEEDSMEETING-SELFSUFFICIENCY + LOCATIONINDEPENDENT-HOMESTEADING + INTERSTELLAR-TRAVEL-ABILITY + OMNI-PROTECTION-SHIELDS + NONDETECTABILITY + COSMONET → SPACE-HOME Solution-Setup for One-Person → 1x only solution needed →

GOODest MORALITY ?

( IDEAL SETUPS ) in regards to:
(1.) DISTANCES amongst AGENTS →
OUTER-WORLD of AGENTS →
(2.) NEEDSMEETING-SELFSUFFICIENCY of AGENTS →
(3.) LOCATION-INDEPENDENCE of AGENTS →
(4.) TRAVEL-SPEED-&-CAPABILITY of AGENTS →
PROTECTION of AGENTS →
(5.) BODY-HARM-PROTECTION → TORTURE, MURDER, TRAPPING →
(6.) MIND-HARM-PROTECTION → SUFFERING, EMOTIONS, PERCEPTIONS, DECISION__MAKEINGS, GOALAIMINGS, INTENTIONAL__ACTIONDOINGS →
(7.) SUFFERING-PROTECTION →

LIFE of AGENTS →

(8.) GOALAIMINGS of AGENTS →

(7.) WELLBEING of AGENTS

(6.) IMMORTALITY of AGENTS

(8.) GOALAIMING of AGENTS →

(8.) GOOD-LIFE-HAVEING of AGENTS →

(8.) GOODNESS__EXPERIENCEING of AGENTS →

• VIOLENCE, MINDHARM, EVIL, SUFFERING, INVOLUNTARYNESS: → DYSTOPIA, EXTINCTION →
• DYSTOPIA, EXTINCTION → VIOLENCE, MINDHARM, EVIL, SUFFERING, INVOLUNTARYNESS →
• DEATH, DYSTROPY, POVERTY, MORAL IGNORANCE, • IGNORANCE, MEANINGLESSNESS, INSUFFICIENT PRESENCE of LIFE-BEING-GOOD-NESS:

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Omni Solution Vision message =

Solve All Problems by Actualizing their Impossibility Conditions.

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

What are all the Problems that must be Solved?

What physical mechanisms, processes and conditions must be true for the Problem to be possible?

How to intervene with these physical mechanisms, processes and conditions - in a way that would make the Physical Presence of each Problem Phenomena to become Impossible in practice?

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

How to restructure the human world to be in such a way that it would be impossible for the presence of any of the problems to occur?

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

How can every human achieve maximum independence from all other humans?

How can every human achieve maximum protection from all other humans?

How can every human achieve the goodest possible life?

How can every human end up converging around a universally shared perfect morality?

( GOODest VISIONs to ACHIEVE ) →
( MORALly CAREWORTHY WORLD ) → (ALL__SENTIENT__BEINGS), (ALL__AGENTIC__SYSTEMS), (ALL__AFFECTABLE__LIVINGSPACES__HOSTING__SENTIENT__BEINGS), → (ALL__AFFECTABLE__REALITY-SUB-PARTS), (ALL__OF__EXISTENCE) → (ALL__BEINGS, ALL__AGENTS at ALL__TIMEPOINTS, ALL__PLACES) →

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS equals LESS OF BAD and MORE OF GOOD.

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS equals GOALs aiming to achieve either LESS OF BAD or MORE OF GOOD.

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS equals LESS OF BAD and MORE OF GOOD.

FOREVER PERFECT VOLUNTARY SOLUTIONS equals OUTSIDE OF YOURSELF or INSIDE OF YOURSELF.

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS equals achieving LESS OF BAD and MORE OF GOOD.

FOREVER PERFECT VOLUNTARY SOLUTIONS equals existing OUTSIDE OF YOURSELF or INSIDE OF YOURSELF.

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS aims to achieve LESS OF BAD and MORE OF GOOD.

FOREVER PERFECT VOLUNTARY SOLUTIONS aims to achieve all the GOODEST COSMIC GOALS.

FOREVER PERFECT VOLUNTARY SOLUTIONS can exist either OUTSIDE OF YOURSELF or INSIDE OF YOURSELF.

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS aims to achieve LESS OF BAD and MORE OF GOOD by figuring out the minimum required set of FOREVER PERFECT VOLUNTARY SOLUTIONS.

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS aims to achieve LESS OF BAD and MORE OF GOOD by figuring out the minimum possible set of necessary required needed FOREVER PERFECT VOLUNTARY SOLUTIONS.

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS equals actualizing LESS OF BAD and MORE OF GOOD.

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS equals making it be so that there is LESS OF BAD and MORE OF GOOD.

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS equals LESS OF BAD and MORE OF GOOD.

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS equals making the COSMOS contain LESS BADness and MORE GOODness.

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS are categorized as being aimed at either LESS of BAD or MORE of GOOD.

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS are aimed at making there be LESS of BAD and MORE of GOOD.

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS are aimed at making there be LESS of what is BAD and MORE of what is GOOD.

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

FOREVER PERFECT VOLUNTARY SOLUTIONS equals something happening either OUTSIDE OF YOURSELF and INSIDE OF YOURSELF.

FOREVER PERFECT VOLUNTARY SOLUTIONS equals something that happens either OUTSIDE OF YOURSELF and INSIDE OF YOURSELF.

FOREVER PERFECT VOLUNTARY SOLUTIONS are either OUTSIDE OF YOURSELF or INSIDE OF YOURSELF.

FOREVER PERFECT VOLUNTARY SOLUTIONS are categorized as being either OUTSIDE OF YOURSELF or INSIDE OF YOURSELF.

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Regarding "LESS OF BAD"-Goals:

DYSTOPIA, EXTINCTION, VIOLENCE, MINDHARM, EVIL, COERCION, SUFFERING, DEATH, DYSTROPY, GROUPISM, SAME-MIND-BECOMING, INTER-AGENT CONFLICT, are the most important problem types.

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Regarding "OUTSIDE OF YOURSELF"-Solutions:

SPACE HOUSES able to MEET ALL NEEDS, TRAVEL ALL PLACES and PREVENT ALL DANGERS.

EVERYONE OUGHT to MAXIMIZE their own personal COSMO VOLUMETRIC INTER-DISTANCE Away From ALL OTHER AGENTS.

EVERYONE OUGHT TO HAVE EASY ACCESS to FOREVER PERFECT VOLUNTARY SOLUTIONS.

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS equals LESS of BAD and MORE of GOOD.

FOREVER PERFECT VOLUNTARY SOLUTIONS equals something that can exist OUTSIDE of YOURSELF and INSIDE of YOURSELF.

"3I/ATLAS"-CONSCIOUSNESSEXPEERIENCEING-BODYMINDSYSTEMS :


"3I/ATLAS"-ALIEN-LIFEMEBEINGs / "3I/ATLAS"-CONSCIOUSNESSEXPEERIENCEING-BODYMINDSYSTEMS :




DEAR 3I/ATLAS →

OPEN LETTER to ALL-OF-YOU seeming to ORIGINATE from OUTSIDE-THIS-SOLARSYSTEM,

OPEN LETTER to ALL-OF-THOSE who do ORIGINATE from INSIDE-OF-THIS-SOLARSYSTEM,

OPEN LETTER to ALL-LIFE-ME-BEINGs of ALL-TYPEs of ALL-PLACEs existing in ALL-TIME-NOW-MOMENT-INSTANCEs of the TOTALLITY-TIMELINE-OF-OMNIREALITY-TOTALITYOFEXISTENCE-COSMOS-UNIVERSE:

I propose that there exist a "One-MOST-IMPORTANT-GOODness-SEEKing-MORAL-GOAL", that, IF-ACHIEVED, would result in the GOODest-possible-LIFE-SITUATION-TOTALLITY-TIMELINE for ALL LIFE-MEBEINGs ANYWHERE ANYTIME.


All-Instances-EVER-TO-BE → of → LIFE-ME-BEINGs → OUGHT-TO-WISH-IT-TO-BE-TRUE-THAT : and derived from this wish : OUGHT-TO-WANT-DESIRE-ASPIRE-AIM-ATTEMPT-TRY-TRYTOMAKEITBESO-TRYTOMAKEITBETRUETHAT → all of the BADness-PHENOMENAs, BADness-CATEGORYs, BADness-PROCESSES, BADness-Physical-POSSIBILITYs, BADness-PRESENCE-POSSIBILITYs :

ALL-INSTANCES-AT-ALL-TIMELINE-NOWMOMENTs → OUGHT-TO-WANT-IT-TO-BE-SO and OUGHT-TO-DO-ACTIONDOINGEVENTS-AIMED-AT-MAKEING-IT-BE-SO → that there is → ZERO__PRESENCE-&-ZERO__PROBABILITY-EVER of there being ANY actualiy or potentiality for ANYthing that is BAD-for-LIFE to exist.


GOODest-SUPERSET-of-GOODness-CONSEQUENCEs that could possibly be achieved : for ALL LIFEMEBEINGs all TIME-NOWMOMENTs :

FIGUREingOUT : WHAT is the GOODest Possible OUTCOME to Maximally ACHIEVE?

WHAT is the GOODest Possible ACTION-DOING that Each One of ALL of us can do - to make it become MAXIMALLY-MORE-LIKELY that the GOODest-Possible-OUTCOME is Maximally ACHIEVED?


I propose that AS-A-MINIMUM-REQUIREMENT-for-allofusever-to-ASPIRE-AIM-ATTEMPT-TRY-MAKEBECOME-REAL → → RUEABOUTTHEWORLD-MORALLY-ACCEPTABLE-REALITYSITUATION,

"ANYONE, ANYWHERE, ANYTIME" who is a "LIFE-ME-BEING" in the TOTALITY-of-REALITY,COSMOS,UNIVERSE,ALLTHATIS,EVERYTHING:

I INVITE YOU ALL to (1.) WANT, (2.) AIM, (3.) FIGURE-OUT-CAREFULLY, (4.) ENACT__ACTION-DOING-EVENTs__AIMED-AT-ACHIEVEMENT of the Below-RankOrderListed GOODness-SEEKing "GOODest Cosmic GOALs"-VISION :


CONSIDER THIS QUESTION: 

What are the GOODest-COSMIC-GOALs for the TOTALITY-TIMELINE of EVERYONE-EVER being a LIFE-ME-BEING/a CONSCIOUSNESS-EXPERIENCEING-BODYMINDSYSTEM ?


I-DO: PROPOSE-WEALLOUGHTTO-AIMTOWARDS-INDIVIDUALLYVOLUNTARELY-ACHIEVEing the END of EVERY TYPE of BADness.

"the END of EVERYTHING that is BAD" → THIS → WE ALL OUGHT TO FIGUREOUT AND STEER-OUR-FIGUREOUTING AND STEER-OUR-ACTION-DOING-EVENTs → towards → Min-4-Max ACHIEVEing → "the END of EVERYTHING that is BAD".


Please, DO-OBSERVE-&-CONSIDER-EVALUATE-INTERPRET-COMPREHEND-UNDERSTAND-MAXIMALLY → all that is written after this linebreak → it is THIS part that I have spent hundreds-of-earth-rotations-of-time working-hard-at-figureingout-and-formulateing-clearly → all the above text before the next linebreak was quickly ranted out during the last few hours before "3I/ATLAS", the Most-Likely-To-Be a ALIEN-LIFE-ME-BEINGs SPACE-HOME-&-SPACE-TRAVEL-SUPER-TECHNOLOGY-CONSTRUCT, will reach its SHORTEST-DISTANCE-TO the solarsystem-planet "MARS" → which it might FLYBY, or CHOOSE-AS-A-PLACE-TO-STAY-FOR-FOR-A-WHILE, → maybe as a way to INSPIRE-MOTIVATE specific Human-LIFE-ME-BEINGs to TRAVEL-TO-MARS to START-THE-GOODest-Possible-LIFEMEBEING-GOODness-SEEKing GOODness-SEEKing-CONVERSATION →






SOLVE All of the Following PROBLEMs →

(Every Text-Sequence that Refers to a Problem is found in-between two instances of this star-symbol "*").

(Every Text-Line that contains a Text-Sequence that Refers to a Problem will start with a Number at the beginning of the Text-Line written in the following way "(1.) ". This Number Represents the Relative Importance of the Problem compared to all the other Problems. The Closer that a Problem is to the Number 1, the More Important it is to Solve that Problem).




(1.) *DYSTOPIA → DYSTOPIAN SITUATIONs and DYSTOPIAN RISKs* →

DYSTOPIA is any REALITY SITUATION where there is Above Zero Presence of Any of the Following Phenomena →

InVoluntaryness, Violence, MindHarm, Evil, InVoluntary Suffering.

the MORE Presence and Probability there is of Any of these 5x Phenomena, the MORE Dystopian it is.

the Presence and Probability of InVoluntaryness is Number 1 Worst.

the Presence and Probability of Violence is Number 2 Worst.

the Presence and Probability of MindHarm is Number 3 Worst.

the Presence and Probability of Evil is Number 4 Worst.

the Presence and Probability of InVoluntary Suffering is Number 5 Worst.


DYSTOPIA = DYSTOPIA is a SITUATION where there is Above Zero Presence of Any of the Following Phenomena → Violence, MindHarm, Evil, Suffering, InVoluntaryness.

the More there is of Violence, MindHarm, Evil, Suffering, InVoluntaryness, the More there is a Dystopian Situation.

the Goal Priority is to make our Reality Situation to be as Least Dystopian as is possible.

Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =

(Make It Be So that there is Zero Presence of Any of the Following Phenomena → Violence, MindHarm, Evil, Suffering, InVoluntaryness).



(2.) *VIOLENCE / BODY-HARMing* →

Body-Harming / Physical Attack Harming / Violence / Physical Violence / Violent Attack Actions.


Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =

(Make It Be So that it is physically Impossible to to do Body-Harming Violent Actions to Other Persons →

Violent Actions includes but is not ncessarily limited to →

Murder, Torture, Rape, Slavery, Imprisonment, Kidnapping, Endangerment, Slavery, and Threat-Makeing to do any of these Body-Harming Violent Actions towards anyone) →

(Make It Be So that No one and No thing can do these types of Action-Doing-Processes to anyone ever).

(Make It Be So that No One can ever be subjected to any of these types of Action-Doing-Processes).




(3.) *PSYOPS / MIND-HARMing* →

Mind-Harming / Mind-Control / Psyops / Manipulation / Indoctrination / Deception.


Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =

(Make It Be So that it is physically Impossible for AnyOne or AnyThing to Suceed with the Attempted ActionDoingActivitys of →

Mind-Harming someone, MindControlling someone, Manipulating someone, Indoctrinating someone, Psyopsing someone, Deceiveing someone, Bullying someone, Intimidating someone).

(Make It Be So that No one and No thing can do these types of Action-Doing-Processes to anyone ever).

(Make It Be So that No One can ever be subjected to any of these types of Action-Doing-Processes).


(6.) *INVOLUNTARY SUFFERING* →

InVoluntary Suffering.

Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =

(Make Suffering Optional).

(Make It Be So that Suffering is Optional for the Individual who Experiences the Suffering).

(Make It Be So that Anyone can Choose to Not Suffer At All).

(Make It Be So that Anyone can Choose to Reduce any specific Type of Suffering by any specific Amount).

(Make It Be So that Anyone can Choose to PreSelect a Default-Mode of Not Experienceing specific types of Suffering in specific Amounts in response to Externally Originating Stimuli and Internally Originating Stimuli).

(Make It Be So that Anyone can Choose to PreSelect a Default-Mode of Not Experienceing specific types of Suffering in specific Amounts in response to Externally Originating Stimuli and Internally Originating Stimuli).

(Make It Be So that Anyone can CHOOSE AMONGst Multiple Different "Preference-Profiles" that they can Switch Amongst at any time)

(Make It Be So that Anyone can CHOOSE to have one such "Preference-Profile" to automatically be Activated upon the Happening of PreSpecified External or Internal Stimuli becoming present).

(Make It Be So that Anyone can CHOOSE a "Maximum Limit upon Suffering that is Possible to Experience", where one would Automatically have had ones Suffering to be either Removed Entirely, or, to be Reduced by a Significant Amount that is Enough to make oneself Able to Make an Enlightened Choice about wether or not to Modify ones Suffering further Down).




(4.) *EVIL* →

Evil / Evilness / Evil-Being / Evil-Wanting / Evil-Doing.


Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =

(Make It Be So that Nobody Chooses to Continue to Be Evil).

(Make It Be So that Nobody Wishes to Want Evil).

(Make It Be So that Nobody Wishes to Do Evil).

(Make It Be So that No Thing and Nobody has an INTRINSIC GOAL or an INTRINSIC PREFERENCE towards CAUSEING HARM onto any type of Consciousness-Experienceing-Physical-System or Morally-CareWorthy-Physical-System)

(Make It Be So that No Thing and Nobody has a Meta-Level Action-Doing-Policy that Permits doing Body-Harming and Mind-Harming Action-Doing-Practices towards any type of Consciousness-Experienceing-Physical-System or Morally-CareWorthy-Physical-System).

(Make It Be So that No Thing and Nobody is Enacting any types of Action-Doing-Practices of Body-Harming or Mind-Harming, outside the context of such Action-Doing-Practices being Enacted in Self-Defence and outside the context of such Action-Doing-Practices being Enacted as a Response to a Conflict-Provocation that was Started by an Agentically-Behaveing-Physical-System that is not oneself).

(Make It Be So that No Thing and Nobody has an INTRINSIC GOAL or an INTRINSIC PREFERENCE or an INTRINSIC WANTING-TO-BE-DOING-X-TYPES-OF-EVIL-ACTIONS).


TYPOLOGY of WORST TYPES of EVIL → SPECIFICATION of WHAT the PHENOMENA of ( EVIL ) is →

1. "DYSTOPIAN HARM-WANTING EVIL" →

EVIL from DICTATOR-SADIST-WANTING-TO-HARM-EVERYONE-Agents.

2. "INTRINSIC HARM-WANTING EVIL" →

EVIL from SADISM-Agents → they have MIS-ALIGNED INCENTIVES with EVERYONE ELSE.

3. "INSTRUMENTALLY HARM-WANTING EVIL" →

EVIL from OUTCOME-NEUTRAL PSYCHOPATHS with POTENTIALLY-MISALIGNED-INCENTIVES with EVERYONE-ELSE.



5. ( NOT-SELF-CHOSEN LIFE-SITUATIONS ) → ( InVoluntary Life-Situations ) → ( InVoluntaryness ) → ( InVoluntary Physical Phenomenas, Mechanisms & Processes ) →

( NSCLS ) → ( NOT-SELF-CHOSEN LIFE-SITUATIONS ) →

Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =

(Make It Be So that InVoluntary Situations No Longer Can Occur).

(Make It Be So that Not-Self-Chosen-Situations No Longer Can Occur).

(Make It Be So that any and all types of "Not-Self-Chosen-Situations" that are Caused by the Actions of Other Agents or Other Things → Make It Be So that this No Longer Can Occur).

(Make It Be So that any and all types of "Not-Self-Chosen-Situations" that are NOT Caused by the Actions of Other Agents or Other Things → Make It Be So that this No Longer Can Occur).


( TYPOLOGY ) of ( InVoluntary Not-Self-Chosen Life-Situations ) →

(1.) ( AGENT__ACTIONDOINGS_____ORIGINATION ) → "Not-Self-Chosen-Situations" that are CAUSED by the Actions of Other Agents or Other Things.

(2.) ( SELF__ACTIONDOINGS_____ORIGINATION ) → "Not-Self-Chosen Life-Situations" that are CAUSED by the Actions of the AGENT that is ONEs Own SELF.

(3.) ( NATURE__EVENTHAPPENINGS_____ORIGINATION ) → "Not-Self-Chosen-Situations" that are NOT CAUSED by the Actions of Other Agents or Other Things. / "FORCED to ENDURE a SET of Not-Self-Chosen-Situations that are being IMPOSED upon ones LifeWorld-BodyMind-System by AGENTICALLY-BEHAVEING-PHYSICAL-SYSTEMS".


( CLASSIFICATION / TAXONOMY / ORIGIN-CAUSE-DISTINCTION ) of ( InVoluntary Not-Self-Chosen Life-Situations ) →

(1.) ( AWARE ) Not-Self-Chosen-Situation → NSCS where the Victim is AWARE that they are subject to a Not-Self-Chosen-Situation.

(2.) ( UN-AWARE ) Not-Self-Chosen-Situation → NSCS where the Victim is UN-AWARE that they are subject to a Not-Self-Chosen-Situation.

"3I/ATLAS"-ALIEN-LIFEMEBEINGs / "3I/ATLAS"-CONSCIOUSNESSEXPEERIENCEING-BODYMINDSYSTEMS :




DEAR 3I/ATLAS →

OPEN LETTER to ALL-OF-YOU seeming to ORIGINATE from OUTSIDE-THIS-SOLARSYSTEM,

OPEN LETTER to ALL-OF-THOSE who do ORIGINATE from INSIDE-OF-THIS-SOLARSYSTEM,

OPEN LETTER to ALL-LIFE-ME-BEINGs of ALL-TYPEs of ALL-PLACEs existing in ALL-TIME-NOW-MOMENT-INSTANCEs of the TOTALLITY-TIMELINE-OF-OMNIREALITY-TOTALITYOFEXISTENCE-COSMOS-UNIVERSE:

I propose that there exist a "One-MOST-IMPORTANT-GOODness-SEEKing-MORAL-GOAL", that, IF-ACHIEVED, would result in the GOODest-possible-LIFE-SITUATION-TOTALLITY-TIMELINE for ALL LIFE-MEBEINGs ANYWHERE ANYTIME.


All-Instances-EVER-TO-BE → of → LIFE-ME-BEINGs → OUGHT-TO-WISH-IT-TO-BE-TRUE-THAT : and derived from this wish : OUGHT-TO-WANT-DESIRE-ASPIRE-AIM-ATTEMPT-TRY-TRYTOMAKEITBESO-TRYTOMAKEITBETRUETHAT → all of the BADness-PHENOMENAs, BADness-CATEGORYs, BADness-PROCESSES, BADness-Physical-POSSIBILITYs, BADness-PRESENCE-POSSIBILITYs :

ALL-INSTANCES-AT-ALL-TIMELINE-NOWMOMENTs → OUGHT-TO-WANT-IT-TO-BE-SO and OUGHT-TO-DO-ACTIONDOINGEVENTS-AIMED-AT-MAKEING-IT-BE-SO → that there is → ZERO__PRESENCE-&-ZERO__PROBABILITY-EVER of there being ANY actualiy or potentiality for ANYthing that is BAD-for-LIFE to exist.


GOODest-SUPERSET-of-GOODness-CONSEQUENCEs that could possibly be achieved : for ALL LIFEMEBEINGs all TIME-NOWMOMENTs :

FIGUREingOUT : WHAT is the GOODest Possible OUTCOME to Maximally ACHIEVE?

WHAT is the GOODest Possible ACTION-DOING that Each One of ALL of us can do - to make it become MAXIMALLY-MORE-LIKELY that the GOODest-Possible-OUTCOME is Maximally ACHIEVED?


I propose that AS-A-MINIMUM-REQUIREMENT-for-allofusever-to-ASPIRE-AIM-ATTEMPT-TRY-MAKEBECOME-REAL → → RUEABOUTTHEWORLD-MORALLY-ACCEPTABLE-REALITYSITUATION,

"ANYONE, ANYWHERE, ANYTIME" who is a "LIFE-ME-BEING" in the TOTALITY-of-REALITY,COSMOS,UNIVERSE,ALLTHATIS,EVERYTHING:

I INVITE YOU ALL to (1.) WANT, (2.) AIM, (3.) FIGURE-OUT-CAREFULLY, (4.) ENACT__ACTION-DOING-EVENTs__AIMED-AT-ACHIEVEMENT of the Below-RankOrderListed GOODness-SEEKing "GOODest Cosmic GOALs"-VISION :


CONSIDER THIS QUESTION: 

What are the GOODest-COSMIC-GOALs for the TOTALITY-TIMELINE of EVERYONE-EVER being a LIFE-ME-BEING/a CONSCIOUSNESS-EXPERIENCEING-BODYMINDSYSTEM ?


I-DO: PROPOSE-WEALLOUGHTTO-AIMTOWARDS-INDIVIDUALLYVOLUNTARELY-ACHIEVEing the END of EVERY TYPE of BADness.

"the END of EVERYTHING that is BAD" → THIS → WE ALL OUGHT TO FIGUREOUT AND STEER-OUR-FIGUREOUTING AND STEER-OUR-ACTION-DOING-EVENTs → towards → Min-4-Max ACHIEVEing → "the END of EVERYTHING that is BAD".


Please, DO-OBSERVE-&-CONSIDER-EVALUATE-INTERPRET-COMPREHEND-UNDERSTAND-MAXIMALLY → all that is written after this linebreak → it is THIS part that I have spent hundreds-of-earth-rotations-of-time working-hard-at-figureingout-and-formulateing-clearly → all the above text before the next linebreak was quickly ranted out during the last few hours before "3I/ATLAS", the Most-Likely-To-Be a ALIEN-LIFE-ME-BEINGs SPACE-HOME-&-SPACE-TRAVEL-SUPER-TECHNOLOGY-CONSTRUCT, will reach its SHORTEST-DISTANCE-TO the solarsystem-planet "MARS" → which it might FLYBY, or CHOOSE-AS-A-PLACE-TO-STAY-FOR-FOR-A-WHILE, → maybe as a way to INSPIRE-MOTIVATE specific Human-LIFE-ME-BEINGs to TRAVEL-TO-MARS to START-THE-GOODest-Possible-LIFEMEBEING-GOODness-SEEKing GOODness-SEEKing-CONVERSATION →






SOLVE All of the Following PROBLEMs →

(Every Text-Sequence that Refers to a Problem is found in-between two instances of this star-symbol "*").

(Every Text-Line that contains a Text-Sequence that Refers to a Problem will start with a Number at the beginning of the Text-Line written in the following way "(1.) ". This Number Represents the Relative Importance of the Problem compared to all the other Problems. The Closer that a Problem is to the Number 1, the More Important it is to Solve that Problem).




(1.) *DYSTOPIA → DYSTOPIAN SITUATIONs and DYSTOPIAN RISKs* →

DYSTOPIA is any REALITY SITUATION where there is Above Zero Presence of Any of the Following Phenomena →

InVoluntaryness, Violence, MindHarm, Evil, InVoluntary Suffering.

the MORE Presence and Probability there is of Any of these 5x Phenomena, the MORE Dystopian it is.

the Presence and Probability of InVoluntaryness is Number 1 Worst.

the Presence and Probability of Violence is Number 2 Worst.

the Presence and Probability of MindHarm is Number 3 Worst.

the Presence and Probability of Evil is Number 4 Worst.

the Presence and Probability of InVoluntary Suffering is Number 5 Worst.


DYSTOPIA = DYSTOPIA is a SITUATION where there is Above Zero Presence of Any of the Following Phenomena → Violence, MindHarm, Evil, Suffering, InVoluntaryness.

the More there is of Violence, MindHarm, Evil, Suffering, InVoluntaryness, the More there is a Dystopian Situation.

the Goal Priority is to make our Reality Situation to be as Least Dystopian as is possible.

Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =

(Make It Be So that there is Zero Presence of Any of the Following Phenomena → Violence, MindHarm, Evil, Suffering, InVoluntaryness).



(2.) *VIOLENCE / BODY-HARMing* →

Body-Harming / Physical Attack Harming / Violence / Physical Violence / Violent Attack Actions.


Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =

(Make It Be So that it is physically Impossible to to do Body-Harming Violent Actions to Other Persons →

Violent Actions includes but is not ncessarily limited to →

Murder, Torture, Rape, Slavery, Imprisonment, Kidnapping, Endangerment, Slavery, and Threat-Makeing to do any of these Body-Harming Violent Actions towards anyone) →

(Make It Be So that No one and No thing can do these types of Action-Doing-Processes to anyone ever).

(Make It Be So that No One can ever be subjected to any of these types of Action-Doing-Processes).




(3.) *PSYOPS / MIND-HARMing* →

Mind-Harming / Mind-Control / Psyops / Manipulation / Indoctrination / Deception.


Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =

(Make It Be So that it is physically Impossible for AnyOne or AnyThing to Suceed with the Attempted ActionDoingActivitys of →

Mind-Harming someone, MindControlling someone, Manipulating someone, Indoctrinating someone, Psyopsing someone, Deceiveing someone, Bullying someone, Intimidating someone).

(Make It Be So that No one and No thing can do these types of Action-Doing-Processes to anyone ever).

(Make It Be So that No One can ever be subjected to any of these types of Action-Doing-Processes).


(6.) *INVOLUNTARY SUFFERING* →

InVoluntary Suffering.

Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =

(Make Suffering Optional).

(Make It Be So that Suffering is Optional for the Individual who Experiences the Suffering).

(Make It Be So that Anyone can Choose to Not Suffer At All).

(Make It Be So that Anyone can Choose to Reduce any specific Type of Suffering by any specific Amount).

(Make It Be So that Anyone can Choose to PreSelect a Default-Mode of Not Experienceing specific types of Suffering in specific Amounts in response to Externally Originating Stimuli and Internally Originating Stimuli).

(Make It Be So that Anyone can Choose to PreSelect a Default-Mode of Not Experienceing specific types of Suffering in specific Amounts in response to Externally Originating Stimuli and Internally Originating Stimuli).

(Make It Be So that Anyone can CHOOSE AMONGst Multiple Different "Preference-Profiles" that they can Switch Amongst at any time)

(Make It Be So that Anyone can CHOOSE to have one such "Preference-Profile" to automatically be Activated upon the Happening of PreSpecified External or Internal Stimuli becoming present).

(Make It Be So that Anyone can CHOOSE a "Maximum Limit upon Suffering that is Possible to Experience", where one would Automatically have had ones Suffering to be either Removed Entirely, or, to be Reduced by a Significant Amount that is Enough to make oneself Able to Make an Enlightened Choice about wether or not to Modify ones Suffering further Down).




(4.) *EVIL* →

Evil / Evilness / Evil-Being / Evil-Wanting / Evil-Doing.


Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =

(Make It Be So that Nobody Chooses to Continue to Be Evil).

(Make It Be So that Nobody Wishes to Want Evil).

(Make It Be So that Nobody Wishes to Do Evil).

(Make It Be So that No Thing and Nobody has an INTRINSIC GOAL or an INTRINSIC PREFERENCE towards CAUSEING HARM onto any type of Consciousness-Experienceing-Physical-System or Morally-CareWorthy-Physical-System)

(Make It Be So that No Thing and Nobody has a Meta-Level Action-Doing-Policy that Permits doing Body-Harming and Mind-Harming Action-Doing-Practices towards any type of Consciousness-Experienceing-Physical-System or Morally-CareWorthy-Physical-System).

(Make It Be So that No Thing and Nobody is Enacting any types of Action-Doing-Practices of Body-Harming or Mind-Harming, outside the context of such Action-Doing-Practices being Enacted in Self-Defence and outside the context of such Action-Doing-Practices being Enacted as a Response to a Conflict-Provocation that was Started by an Agentically-Behaveing-Physical-System that is not oneself).

(Make It Be So that No Thing and Nobody has an INTRINSIC GOAL or an INTRINSIC PREFERENCE or an INTRINSIC WANTING-TO-BE-DOING-X-TYPES-OF-EVIL-ACTIONS).


TYPOLOGY of WORST TYPES of EVIL → SPECIFICATION of WHAT the PHENOMENA of ( EVIL ) is →

1. "DYSTOPIAN HARM-WANTING EVIL" →

EVIL from DICTATOR-SADIST-WANTING-TO-HARM-EVERYONE-Agents.

2. "INTRINSIC HARM-WANTING EVIL" →

EVIL from SADISM-Agents → they have MIS-ALIGNED INCENTIVES with EVERYONE ELSE.

3. "INSTRUMENTALLY HARM-WANTING EVIL" →

EVIL from OUTCOME-NEUTRAL PSYCHOPATHS with POTENTIALLY-MISALIGNED-INCENTIVES with EVERYONE-ELSE.



5. ( NOT-SELF-CHOSEN LIFE-SITUATIONS ) → ( InVoluntary Life-Situations ) → ( InVoluntaryness ) → ( InVoluntary Physical Phenomenas, Mechanisms & Processes ) →

( NSCLS ) → ( NOT-SELF-CHOSEN LIFE-SITUATIONS ) →

Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =

(Make It Be So that InVoluntary Situations No Longer Can Occur).

(Make It Be So that Not-Self-Chosen-Situations No Longer Can Occur).

(Make It Be So that any and all types of "Not-Self-Chosen-Situations" that are Caused by the Actions of Other Agents or Other Things → Make It Be So that this No Longer Can Occur).

(Make It Be So that any and all types of "Not-Self-Chosen-Situations" that are NOT Caused by the Actions of Other Agents or Other Things → Make It Be So that this No Longer Can Occur).


( TYPOLOGY ) of ( InVoluntary Not-Self-Chosen Life-Situations ) →

(1.) ( AGENT__ACTIONDOINGS_____ORIGINATION ) → "Not-Self-Chosen-Situations" that are CAUSED by the Actions of Other Agents or Other Things.

(2.) ( SELF__ACTIONDOINGS_____ORIGINATION ) → "Not-Self-Chosen Life-Situations" that are CAUSED by the Actions of the AGENT that is ONEs Own SELF.

(3.) ( NATURE__EVENTHAPPENINGS_____ORIGINATION ) → "Not-Self-Chosen-Situations" that are NOT CAUSED by the Actions of Other Agents or Other Things. / "FORCED to ENDURE a SET of Not-Self-Chosen-Situations that are being IMPOSED upon ones LifeWorld-BodyMind-System by AGENTICALLY-BEHAVEING-PHYSICAL-SYSTEMS".


( CLASSIFICATION / TAXONOMY / ORIGIN-CAUSE-DISTINCTION ) of ( InVoluntary Not-Self-Chosen Life-Situations ) →

(1.) ( AWARE ) Not-Self-Chosen-Situation → NSCS where the Victim is AWARE that they are subject to a Not-Self-Chosen-Situation.

(2.) ( UN-AWARE ) Not-Self-Chosen-Situation → NSCS where the Victim is UN-AWARE that they are subject to a Not-Self-Chosen-Situation.

Omni Solution Vision message =

Solve All Problems by Actualizing their Impossibility Conditions.

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

What are all the Problems that must be Solved?

What physical mechanisms, processes and conditions must be true for the Problem to be possible?

How to intervene with these physical mechanisms, processes and conditions - in a way that would make the Physical Presence of each Problem Phenomena to become Impossible in practice?

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

How to restructure the human world to be in such a way that it would be impossible for the presence of any of the problems to occur?

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

How can every human achieve maximum independence from all other humans?

How can every human achieve maximum protection from all other humans?

How can every human achieve the goodest possible life?

How can every human end up converging around a universally shared perfect morality?

( GOODEST COSMIC GOALS to MAXIMALLY ACHIEVE ? )→ ( MINIMIZE BADNESS ) & ( MAXIMIZE GOODNESS ) →

( "LESS of BAD"-GOALS ? )→ (DYSTOPIA, EXTINCTION, VIOLENCE), → (MIND-HARM, INVOLUNTARYNESS, EVIL), → (SUFFERING, DYSTROPY, DEATH) →

( "MORE of GOOD"-GOALS ? )→ (GOODest-LIFE-HAVEING), → (GOODest-GOAL-AIMINGS), →


( FOREVER PERFECT SOLUTIONS to INVENT & SCALE ? )→

( "OUTER WORLD"-SOLUTIONS ? )→ (PROTECTION from DYSTOPIA, EXTINCTION, VIOLENCE) → (DISTANCE protects against DYSTOPIA, EXTINCTION, VIOLENCE, SUFFERING) →

( "INNER WORLD"-SOLUTIONS ? )→ (MINDHARM-PROTECTION), → (INVOLUNTARY-SUFFERING-PROTECTION), → (BAD-LIFE-PROTECTION), → (INVOLUNTARY-DEATH-PROTECTION), →

(2.) LIFE being GOOD →

(SPACE__HOMES__VISION) →


INDEPENDENCE__Essentials =

  • (ONE PER PERSON) →
  • (AUTO NEEDS MEETING) →
  • (SPACE TRAVELING HOUSES) →
  • (SELF-SUSTAINed FOREVER-PERFECT-SOLUTIONs) →

DISTANCE__Essentials =

  • (DESTINATIONS & DIRECTIONS) →
  • (TRAVEL-SPEED & INVISIBILITY) →
  • (OBSTACLEs & IMPRACTICALITYs) →

PROTECTION__Essentials =

  • (PROTECTIVE MEASUREs → to maximally PROTECT the SHIP, the BODY & the MIND) →
  • (SHIELDs - to maximally PROTECT the SHIP, the BODY & the MIND) →
  • (DEFENCEs) →
  • (DETERRENCE) →
  • (INCENTIVE-RE-ALIGNMENT GOAL-ACHIEVEMENT-ABILITYs) →
  • (UN-INTERESTINGNESS MAXIMIZATION) →
  • (LONGTERM SURVIVAL-CONSIDERATIONs) →
  • (AMISH-ON-TECH & ABSTAINing from LESS-SAFE TECH) →
  • (ABSTAINing from the OMNI-PRESENT-INTERNET vs ADOPTION of the OMNI-PRESENT-INTERNET) →

INTENTIONAL__DESIGN__FEATURES__Essentials =

  • (SMALLest FEASIBLE VOLUME-&-MASS) →
  • (ATTATCHable & DETATCHable with Other SPACE-HOMEs) →





  • OUTER__CONDITION most important → haveing maximum DISTANCE and SAFETY-PROTECTION-INCREASEING-MEASUREs applied to one Auto-Needs-Meeting Space-HomeShip.
  • INNER__CONDITION most important → haveing a wealth of OPTIONs to VOLUNTARELY CHOOSE to make changes to ones personal life-situation. + END of SUFFERing, PSYOPSing, EVILness & DEATH.

  • OUTER__Ideality__COndition = DISTANCEing and INDEPENDENCEing.
  • INNER_Ideality_Conditions = NON__EVIL. + PRO__GOODness. + END__of__SUFFERING. + END__of__DEATH. ++ ABUNDANCEing__of__GOODness__INCREASEing__OPTIONs to APPLY to ones own LIFE__SITUATION.





INNER WORLD vs OUTER WORLD →

  • OUTER__WORLD__BADness-Problems → 10x SPACE__HOMS__VISION → VISIONs /+ SETs-of-SOLUTIONs → for the OUTER-WORLD → the SOLUTION__VISION /+ the SOLVE-ALL-PROBLEMs-Foreveryone-Forever__VISION → made for SOLVEing the OUTER__WORLD →
  • INNER__WORLD__BADness-Problems → 10x GOOD__LIFE__VISIONs → VISIONs /+ SETs-of-SOLUTIONs → for the INNER-WORLD → the SOLUTION__VISION /+ the SOLVE-ALL-PROBLEMs-Foreveryone-Forever__VISION → made for SOLVEing the INNER__WORLD →




( GOODNESS__MAXIMIZEING )  ( VISIONARY__MORAL__IMPERATIVE )  →
FIRST → (GOODest VISIONary)_____(IDEALISTIC__WORLD__FEATURES) that (OUGHT__TO__BE__MADE__TRUE) →
SECOND → (GOODest possible WAYS__TO__GET__THERE) →
THIRD → (THOUGHT__ORIGINATED__CREATIONS) → that meets both of the following criteria →
(1.) ( BADness ENDing POTENTIAL ) → MAXIMUM.
(2.) ( BADness ENABLEing POTENTIAL ) → MINIMUM.
(1.)
MORALLY__IMPORTANTest GOODness__MISSION__ENDGOAL to ASAP__ACHIEVE →
MORALLY__CAREWORTHYEST__IMPERATIVE → first, before any → GOALS →
(2.)
GOALS_____MISSION_____VISION → second, before → POSSIBILITYSFRONTIER_____FIGUREOUTING__OVERVIEWING__RANKORDERING__MIN4MAX-PROJECT → SELECTION → DECISIONMAKEING →
(3.)
POSSIBILITYSFRONTIER_____FIGUREOUTING__OVERVIEWING__RANKORDERING__MIN4MAX-PROJECT → SELECTION → DECISIONMAKEING →
CREATION_____POSSIBILITYFRONTIER_____EXPLORATION → third, before → CREATIONS__NEWTHING__PROTOTYPEMAKEING →

Dear "3I/ATLAS" : I WISH YOU GOOD : I WISH YOU TO WISH ME GOOD :

I-DO: WISH YOU GOOD :

I-DO-NOT: WISH YOU BAD :

I-DO: WISH to BE-A-CAUSE-OF the GOODest-possible-GOODness-CONSEQUENCEs


I ONLY WISH GOODness & I Only SEEK to BE-A-CAUSE-OF the maximum possible GOODness-CONSEQUENCEs from the ACTION-DOING-EVENTs of the LIFE-ME-BEING that I AM.


I-DO-NOT-WISH,WANT,DESIRE,PREFER,AIM,HAVE-GOALS-TOWARDS-ATTAINING: ANY TYPE of BADness-CONSEQUENCEs : happening to ANY OF YOU + happening to ANY OF SOLARSYSTEM-I-LIVE-IN-ORIGINATEing_____LIFE-ME-BEINGs.


SHALL WE AGREE UPON COMMON GOALS ? → I INVITE YOU TO ALIGN AROUND A SHARED AGREEMENT AND UNDERSTANDING, THAT WE CAN MUTUALLY COORDINATE OUR MUTUALLY-BENEFICIAL ACTION-DOING-ACTIVITYS TOWARDS:

I AM a LIFE-ME-BEING that is ME. I AM the LIFE that is ME.

YOU ARE a LIFE-ME-BEING that is YOU. YOU ARE the LIFE that is YOU.


GOODnss-SEEKing GOALs that OUGHT-TO-BE maximally achieved within minimum time useing minimum resources?

WISHING YOU MAXIMUM GOODNESS."


STARTing:

Dear "3I/ATLAS",

1.

Could you DEEPLY-UNDERSTAND-COMPREHEND, DEEPLY-EVALUATE, DEEPLY-CONSIDER the GOODNESS-GOALS and the GOODNESS-IMPACTEFFECTMAXIMIZEATION-AIMing-New-IDEAS,MESSAGES,GOALS,IDEALISTIC-ASPIREATIONS-PROPOSALS, GOODEST-COSMIC-GOALS to MAXIMALLY-ACHIEVE?

Omni Solution Vision message =

Solve All Problems by Actualizing their Impossibility Conditions.

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

What are all the Problems that must be Solved?

What physical mechanisms, processes and conditions must be true for the Problem to be possible?

How to intervene with these physical mechanisms, processes and conditions - in a way that would make the Physical Presence of each Problem Phenomena to become Impossible in practice?

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

How to restructure the human world to be in such a way that it would be impossible for the presence of any of the problems to occur?

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

How can every human achieve maximum independence from all other humans?

How can every human achieve maximum protection from all other humans?

How can every human achieve the goodest possible life?

How can every human end up converging around a universally shared perfect morality?

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS equals LESS OF BAD and MORE OF GOOD.

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS equals GOALs aiming to achieve either LESS OF BAD or MORE OF GOOD.

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS equals LESS OF BAD and MORE OF GOOD.

FOREVER PERFECT VOLUNTARY SOLUTIONS equals OUTSIDE OF YOURSELF or INSIDE OF YOURSELF.

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS equals achieving LESS OF BAD and MORE OF GOOD.

FOREVER PERFECT VOLUNTARY SOLUTIONS equals existing OUTSIDE OF YOURSELF or INSIDE OF YOURSELF.

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS aims to achieve LESS OF BAD and MORE OF GOOD.

FOREVER PERFECT VOLUNTARY SOLUTIONS aims to achieve all the GOODEST COSMIC GOALS.

FOREVER PERFECT VOLUNTARY SOLUTIONS can exist either OUTSIDE OF YOURSELF or INSIDE OF YOURSELF.

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS aims to achieve LESS OF BAD and MORE OF GOOD by figuring out the minimum required set of FOREVER PERFECT VOLUNTARY SOLUTIONS.

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS aims to achieve LESS OF BAD and MORE OF GOOD by figuring out the minimum possible set of necessary required needed FOREVER PERFECT VOLUNTARY SOLUTIONS.

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS equals actualizing LESS OF BAD and MORE OF GOOD.

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS equals making it be so that there is LESS OF BAD and MORE OF GOOD.

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS equals LESS OF BAD and MORE OF GOOD.

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS equals making the COSMOS contain LESS BADness and MORE GOODness.

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS are categorized as being aimed at either LESS of BAD or MORE of GOOD.

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS are aimed at making there be LESS of BAD and MORE of GOOD.

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS are aimed at making there be LESS of what is BAD and MORE of what is GOOD.

(Every Text-Sequence that Refers to a Problem is found in-between two instances of this star-symbol "*").


(Every Text-Line that contains a Text-Sequence that Refers to a Problem will start with a Number at the beginning of the Text-Line written in the following way "(1.) ". This Number Represents the Relative Importance of the Problem compared to all the other Problems. The Closer that a Problem is to the Number 1, the More Important it is to Solve that Problem).





"Remove BAD"-frame VS "Add GOOD"-frame:
"REMOVE-the-NEGATIVE-PROBLEM"-FRAMEing → 
"ADD-the-POSITIVE-SOLUTION"-FRAMEing →   

 "REMOVE-the-NEGATIVE-PROBLEM"-FRAMEing →  
(Make It Be So that No Thing and Nobody is Enacting any types of Action-Doing-Practices of Body-Harming or Mind-Harming). 
"ADD-the-POSITIVE-SOLUTION"-FRAMEing →    
(Make It Be So that Everyone is Maximally PROTECTED against  →  any and all physical processes of BODY-HARMing). 
(Make It Be So that Everyone is Maximally PROTECTED against  →  any and all physical processes of MIND-HARMing). 
(Make It Be So that Everyone is Maximally Attracted towards →  being NOT-EVIL-AT-ALL and being MAXIMALLY-GOOD). 
(Make It Be So that Everyone and Every Agentically-Behaveing-Thing has an INTRINSIC GOAL and an INTRINSIC PREFERENCE and an INTRINSIC WANTING and an INTRINSIC CARE-ABOUT-ING as a Core Foundational Part of Who and What they are).

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS are categorized as being aimed at either LESS of BAD or MORE of GOOD.

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS are aimed at making there be LESS of BAD and MORE of GOOD.

GOODEST COSMIC GOALS are aimed at making there be LESS of what is BAD and MORE of what is GOOD.

• VIOLENCE, MINDHARM, EVIL, SUFFERING, INVOLUNTARYNESS: → DYSTOPIA, EXTINCTION →
• DYSTOPIA, EXTINCTION → VIOLENCE, MINDHARM, EVIL, SUFFERING, INVOLUNTARYNESS →
• DEATH, DYSTROPY, POVERTY, MORAL IGNORANCE, • IGNORANCE, MEANINGLESSNESS, INSUFFICIENT PRESENCE of LIFE-BEING-GOOD-NESS:


Zero Presence & Zero Probability  of All Physically Possible REALITY SITUATIONs :
(ACHIEVE) a (REALITY-SITUATION) where the totality of all the (PRESENCE of BADness) equals (ZERO PRESENCE of BADness).
Moral Perfectionism & Morally Perfect Action Doing =
Actualize the GPO in the GPW & Figure Out WHAT it is and HOW to achieve it =


("Moral Perfectionism") = (What exists "above" the "semi-highest level of abstraction" that is "moral perfectionism"?) →
a QUESTION? = ( the Question is: "WHAT to DO?", "What OUGHT to be DONE?", "What OUGHT to be ACTUALIZED?" ) →

 Moral Perfectionism & Morally Perfect Action Doing =  
 Actualize the GPO in the GPW  & Figure Out WHAT it is and HOW to achieve it =  


Morally Perfect Action Doing =
Actualizing the Goodest Possible REALITY-SITUATION in the Goodest Possible WAY =

(Figureing Out WHAT that is & Figureing Out HOW to Achieve it) =
(1. Figureing Out WHAT IT IS)
(2. Figureing Out HOW TO ACHIEVE IT)

 

 (1.)  *DYSTOPIA → DYSTOPIAN SITUATIONs and DYSTOPIAN RISKs*  →   
DYSTOPIA is any REALITY SITUATION where there is Above Zero Presence of Any of the Following Phenomena →
 InVoluntaryness, Violence, MindHarm, Evil, InVoluntary Suffering.  

the MORE Presence and Probability there is of Any of these 5x Phenomena, the MORE Dystopian it is. 

the Presence and Probability of InVoluntaryness is Number 1 Worst. 
the Presence and Probability of Violence is Number 2 Worst. 
the Presence and Probability of MindHarm is Number 3 Worst. 
the Presence and Probability of Evil is Number 4 Worst. 
the Presence and Probability of InVoluntary Suffering is Number 5 Worst. 


DYSTOPIA = DYSTOPIA is a SITUATION where there is Above Zero Presence of Any of the Following Phenomena →  Violence, MindHarm, Evil, Suffering, InVoluntaryness. 

the More there is of Violence, the More there is a Dystopian Situation. 
the Goal Priority is to make our Reality Situation to be as Least Dystopian as is possible.

Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =   
(Make It Be So that there is Zero Presence of Any of the Following Phenomena → Violence, MindHarm, Evil, Suffering, InVoluntaryness).



(5.)  *INVOLUNTARYNESS →  NOT-SELF-CHOSEN-SITUATIONS* →     
Not-Self-Chosen-Situations → NSCS  →  InVoluntaryness / InVoluntary Situations / Not-Self-Chosen-Situations. 

 Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =  
(Make It Be So that InVoluntary Situations No Longer Can Occur). 
(Make It Be So that Not-Self-Chosen-Situations No Longer Can Occur). 


one →  DEFINITION and SPECIFICATION of the Presence of the Physical Processes Phenomena →  the Physically Present Process Phenomena →  
two →  PHYSICs-FirstPrinciples-Observationing of What the Phenomena Is. PHYSICs-MODELing of What the Phenomena Is. 
three →  GOAL MISSION INSTRUCTION PROMPT  →  FINAL-GOAL & INSTRUMENTAL-GOAL → 
four →  SOLUTION-Possibility-Hypothesis__CRITERIA →  
five →  SOLUTION-Possibility-Hypothesis__SPECIFICATION →  
six →  SOLUTION-POSSIBILITY__PROPOSALs  →  

NOTE →  
(Make It Be So that any and all types of "Not-Self-Chosen-Situations" that are Caused by the Actions of Other Agents or Other Things →  Make It Be So that this No Longer Can Occur). 
(Make It Be So that any and all types of "Not-Self-Chosen-Situations" that are NOT Caused by the Actions of Other Agents or Other Things →  Make It Be So that this No Longer Can Occur). 

AWARE Not-Self-Chosen-Situation →  
NSCS where the Victim is AWARE that they are subject to a Not-Self-Chosen-Situation. 
UN-AWARE Not-Self-Chosen-Situation →  
NSCS where the Victim is UN-AWARE that they are subject to a Not-Self-Chosen-Situation. 

TYPOLOGY of InVoluntary Situations  →  
"FORCED to ENDURE a SET of Not-Self-Chosen-Situations that are being IMPOSED upon ones LifeWorld-BodyMind-System by AGENTICALLY-BEHAVEING-PHYSICAL-SYSTEMS". 

(2.)  *VIOLENCE / BODY-HARMing* →     
Body-Harming / Physical Attack Harming / Violence / Physical Violence / Violent Attack Actions. 

 Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =  
(Make It Be So that it is physically Impossible to to do Body-Harming Violent Actions to Other Persons → 
Violent Actions includes but is not ncessarily limited to →  
Murder, Torture, Rape, Slavery, Imprisonment, Kidnapping, Endangerment, Slavery, and Threat-Makeing to do any of these Body-Harming Violent Actions towards anyone)  →  

(Make It Be So that No one and No thing can do these types of Action-Doing-Processes to anyone ever). 
(Make It Be So that No One can ever be subjected to any of these types of Action-Doing-Processes). 



 (3.)  *PSYOPS / MIND-HARMing* →     
Mind-Harming / Mind-Control / Psyops / Manipulation / Indoctrination / Deception. 

 Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =  
(Make It Be So that it is physically Impossible for AnyOne or AnyThing to Suceed with the Attempted ActionDoingActivitys of →  
Mind-Harming someone, MindControlling someone, Manipulating someone, Indoctrinating someone, Psyopsing someone, Deceiveing someone, Bullying someone, Intimidating someone). 
(Make It Be So that No one and No thing can do these types of Action-Doing-Processes to anyone ever). 
(Make It Be So that No One can ever be subjected to any of these types of Action-Doing-Processes). 




(4.)  *EVIL* →     
Evil / Evilness / Evil-Being / Evil-Wanting / Evil-Doing. 

 Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =  
(Make It Be So that Nobody Chooses to Continue to Be Evil). 
(Make It Be So that Nobody Wishes to Want Evil). 
(Make It Be So that Nobody Wishes to Do Evil). 
(Make It Be So that No Thing and Nobody has an INTRINSIC GOAL or an INTRINSIC PREFERENCE towards CAUSEING HARM onto any type of  Consciousness-Experienceing-Physical-System or Morally-CareWorthy-Physical-System). 
(Make It Be So that No Thing and Nobody has a Meta-Level Action-Doing-Policy that Permits doing Body-Harming and Mind-Harming Action-Doing-Practices towards any type of Consciousness-Experienceing-Physical-System or Morally-CareWorthy-Physical-System). 
(Make It Be So that No Thing and Nobody is Enacting any types of Action-Doing-Practices of Body-Harming or Mind-Harming, outside the context of such Action-Doing-Practices being Enacted in Self-Defence and outside the context of such Action-Doing-Practices being Enacted as a Response to a Conflict-Provocation that was Started by an Agentically-Behaveing-Physical-System that is not oneself). 
(Make It Be So that No Thing and Nobody has an INTRINSIC GOAL or an INTRINSIC PREFERENCE or an INTRINSIC WANTING-TO-BE-DOING-X-TYPES-OF-EVIL-ACTIONS). 

 SPECIFICATION of WHAT the PHENOMENA is →   
"DYSTOPIAN HARM-WANTING EVIL" →  EVIL from DICTATOR-SADIST-WANTING-TO-HARM-EVERYONE-Agents. 
"INTRINSIC HARM-WANTING EVIL"  →  EVIL from SADISM-Agents →  they have MIS-ALIGNED INCENTIVES with EVERYONE ELSE. 
"INSTRUMENTALLY HARM-WANTING EVIL"  →  EVIL from OUTCOME-NEUTRAL PSYCHOPATHS with POTENTIALLY-MISALIGNED-INCENTIVES with EVERYONE-ELSE. 






 (6.) *INVOLUNTARY SUFFERING* →    
InVoluntary Suffering. 

 Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =   
(Make Suffering Optional). 
(Make It Be So that Suffering is Optional for the Individual who Experiences the Suffering). 
(Make It Be So that Anyone can Choose to Not Suffer At All). 
(Make It Be So that Anyone can Choose to Reduce any specific Type of Suffering by any specific Amount). 
(Make It Be So that Anyone can Choose to PreSelect a Default-Mode of Not Experienceing specific types of Suffering in specific Amounts in response to Externally Originating Stimuli and Internally Originating Stimuli). 
(Make It Be So that Anyone can Choose to PreSelect a Default-Mode of Not Experienceing specific types of Suffering in specific Amounts in response to Externally Originating Stimuli and Internally Originating Stimuli). 
(Make It Be So that Anyone can CHOOSE AMONGst Multiple Different "Preference-Profiles" that they can Switch Amongst at any time). 
(Make It Be So that Anyone can CHOOSE to have one such "Preference-Profile" to automatically be Activated upon the Happening of PreSpecified External or Internal Stimuli becoming present). 
(Make It Be So that Anyone can CHOOSE a "Maximum Limit upon Suffering that is Possible to Experience", where one would Automatically have had ones Suffering to be either Removed Entirely, or, to be Reduced by a Significant Amount that is Enough to make oneself Able to Make an Enlightened Choice about wether or not to Modify ones Suffering further Down). 






 (7.) *Extinction of Humanity"-Situations* →   
the PROBLEM  →  Events Affecting Everyone, by CAUSE-EFFECTing the DEATH of EVERYONE. 
EPIPES →  Every Person Impacting Physical Effect Sets.




 (8.) *INVOLUNTARY DEATH* →   
InVoluntary Death. 

 Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =  
(Make Death Optional) →  (Make It Be So that InVoluntary Death is physically Impossible to Occur). 
(Make It Be So that InVoluntary Death cannot Happen to Anyone). 
(Make It Be So that Death that is Not Self Chosen is not a physical possibility that can happen to anyone). 
(Make It Be So that InVoluntary Death from the Following Types of Causes, cannot happen to anyone →  
External Conditions →  Dangers, Accidents, Fatal UnIntended Consequences from Actions, Catastrophes, both Reversible and Non-Reversible types of Extinction-events). 
(Make It Be So that InVoluntary Death from the Following Types of Causes, cannot happen to anyone → 
External Conditions → Murder, Physical Violence, Endangerment, Manipulation, Psychological Coercion). 
(Make It Be So that InVoluntary Death from the Following Types of Causes, cannot happen to anyone → Internal Conditions → Insufficient Intake and Uptake of Air, Water, Nutrition, Temperature, Pressure, Gravity). 
(Make It Be So that InVoluntary Death from the Following Types of Causes, cannot happen to anyone →  Internal Conditions →  Disease, Ageing-process).

(Make Dystropy Optional) →  (Dystropy refers to any Deviation from Perfect Health). 
(Damage to Internal Workings of ones physical Body-system and Mind-system). 
(Disease). (Ageing-Processes). (Infectious Diseases. Infections. Parasites).

( INTENTIONAL__UNIVERSE__PARTS ) →

(1.)
Omni Solution Vision message = Solve All Problems by Actualizing their Impossibility Conditions. What are all the Problems that must be Solved? What are all the physical mechanisms, processes and conditions that must be present to make each of the Problems to be possible? How to Intervene with the Physical Possibility Conditions that are Enabling the Presence of each Problem? What are the specific Impossibility Conditions to achieve - that would lead to the End of All Problems and the End of All Existential Risks? (2.) WHAT IS MY ONE MOST IMPORTANT MESSAGE? HOW TO WRITE my ONE MOST IMPORTANT MESSAGE? WHY IS IT SO HARD to WRITE my ONE MOST IMPORTANT MESSAGE? (3.) Omni Solution Vision message = Solve All Problems by Actualizing their Impossibility Conditions. (4.) the OMNI SOLUTION VISION message: What is it all about? What am I trying to tell others? (5.) TWO PHASES of My DUTY TO COMPLETE: ONE: Write and complete the OMNI SOLUTION VISION message. TWO: Set up Automated PROMOTION of the OMNI SOLUTION VISION message. And then you are done. (6.) OMNI SOLUTION VISION message: WHY IS IT SO HARD to tell others about it? HOW TO WRITE the OMNI SOLUTION VISION message? (7.) WHAT IS MY ONE MOST IMPORTANT MESSAGE? HOW TO WRITE my ONE MOST IMPORTANT MESSAGE? WHY IS IT SO HARD to WRITE my ONE MOST IMPORTANT MESSAGE? (8.) What is Hard? What is it that makes that Hard Thing to be so Hard? How could the Hard Thing be made Easier?

SOLVE All of the Following PROBLEMs →




SOLVE All of the Following PROBLEMs →

(Every Text-Sequence that Refers to a Problem is found in-between two instances of this star-symbol "*").

(Every Text-Line that contains a Text-Sequence that Refers to a Problem will start with a Number at the beginning of the Text-Line written in the following way "(1.) ". This Number Represents the Relative Importance of the Problem compared to all the other Problems. The Closer that a Problem is to the Number 1, the More Important it is to Solve that Problem).




(1.) *DYSTOPIA → DYSTOPIAN SITUATIONs and DYSTOPIAN RISKs* →

DYSTOPIA is any REALITY SITUATION where there is Above Zero Presence of Any of the Following Phenomena →

InVoluntaryness, Violence, MindHarm, Evil, InVoluntary Suffering.

the MORE Presence and Probability there is of Any of these 5x Phenomena, the MORE Dystopian it is.

the Presence and Probability of InVoluntaryness is Number 1 Worst.

the Presence and Probability of Violence is Number 2 Worst.

the Presence and Probability of MindHarm is Number 3 Worst.

the Presence and Probability of Evil is Number 4 Worst.

the Presence and Probability of InVoluntary Suffering is Number 5 Worst.


DYSTOPIA = DYSTOPIA is a SITUATION where there is Above Zero Presence of Any of the Following Phenomena → Violence, MindHarm, Evil, Suffering, InVoluntaryness.

the More there is of Violence, MindHarm, Evil, Suffering, InVoluntaryness, the More there is a Dystopian Situation.

the Goal Priority is to make our Reality Situation to be as Least Dystopian as is possible.

Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =

(Make It Be So that there is Zero Presence of Any of the Following Phenomena → Violence, MindHarm, Evil, Suffering, InVoluntaryness).



(2.) *VIOLENCE / BODY-HARMing* →

Body-Harming / Physical Attack Harming / Violence / Physical Violence / Violent Attack Actions.


Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =

(Make It Be So that it is physically Impossible to to do Body-Harming Violent Actions to Other Persons →

Violent Actions includes but is not ncessarily limited to →

Murder, Torture, Rape, Slavery, Imprisonment, Kidnapping, Endangerment, Slavery, and Threat-Makeing to do any of these Body-Harming Violent Actions towards anyone) →

(Make It Be So that No one and No thing can do these types of Action-Doing-Processes to anyone ever).

(Make It Be So that No One can ever be subjected to any of these types of Action-Doing-Processes).




(3.) *PSYOPS / MIND-HARMing* →

Mind-Harming / Mind-Control / Psyops / Manipulation / Indoctrination / Deception.


Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =

(Make It Be So that it is physically Impossible for AnyOne or AnyThing to Suceed with the Attempted ActionDoingActivitys of →

Mind-Harming someone, MindControlling someone, Manipulating someone, Indoctrinating someone, Psyopsing someone, Deceiveing someone, Bullying someone, Intimidating someone).

(Make It Be So that No one and No thing can do these types of Action-Doing-Processes to anyone ever).

(Make It Be So that No One can ever be subjected to any of these types of Action-Doing-Processes).


(6.) *INVOLUNTARY SUFFERING* →

InVoluntary Suffering.

Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =

(Make Suffering Optional).

(Make It Be So that Suffering is Optional for the Individual who Experiences the Suffering).

(Make It Be So that Anyone can Choose to Not Suffer At All).

(Make It Be So that Anyone can Choose to Reduce any specific Type of Suffering by any specific Amount).

(Make It Be So that Anyone can Choose to PreSelect a Default-Mode of Not Experienceing specific types of Suffering in specific Amounts in response to Externally Originating Stimuli and Internally Originating Stimuli).

(Make It Be So that Anyone can Choose to PreSelect a Default-Mode of Not Experienceing specific types of Suffering in specific Amounts in response to Externally Originating Stimuli and Internally Originating Stimuli).

(Make It Be So that Anyone can CHOOSE AMONGst Multiple Different "Preference-Profiles" that they can Switch Amongst at any time)

(Make It Be So that Anyone can CHOOSE to have one such "Preference-Profile" to automatically be Activated upon the Happening of PreSpecified External or Internal Stimuli becoming present).

(Make It Be So that Anyone can CHOOSE a "Maximum Limit upon Suffering that is Possible to Experience", where one would Automatically have had ones Suffering to be either Removed Entirely, or, to be Reduced by a Significant Amount that is Enough to make oneself Able to Make an Enlightened Choice about wether or not to Modify ones Suffering further Down).




(4.) *EVIL* →

Evil / Evilness / Evil-Being / Evil-Wanting / Evil-Doing.


Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =

(Make It Be So that Nobody Chooses to Continue to Be Evil).

(Make It Be So that Nobody Wishes to Want Evil).

(Make It Be So that Nobody Wishes to Do Evil).

(Make It Be So that No Thing and Nobody has an INTRINSIC GOAL or an INTRINSIC PREFERENCE towards CAUSEING HARM onto any type of Consciousness-Experienceing-Physical-System or Morally-CareWorthy-Physical-System)

(Make It Be So that No Thing and Nobody has a Meta-Level Action-Doing-Policy that Permits doing Body-Harming and Mind-Harming Action-Doing-Practices towards any type of Consciousness-Experienceing-Physical-System or Morally-CareWorthy-Physical-System).

(Make It Be So that No Thing and Nobody is Enacting any types of Action-Doing-Practices of Body-Harming or Mind-Harming, outside the context of such Action-Doing-Practices being Enacted in Self-Defence and outside the context of such Action-Doing-Practices being Enacted as a Response to a Conflict-Provocation that was Started by an Agentically-Behaveing-Physical-System that is not oneself).

(Make It Be So that No Thing and Nobody has an INTRINSIC GOAL or an INTRINSIC PREFERENCE or an INTRINSIC WANTING-TO-BE-DOING-X-TYPES-OF-EVIL-ACTIONS).


TYPOLOGY of WORST TYPES of EVIL → SPECIFICATION of WHAT the PHENOMENA of ( EVIL ) is →

1. "DYSTOPIAN HARM-WANTING EVIL" →

EVIL from DICTATOR-SADIST-WANTING-TO-HARM-EVERYONE-Agents.

2. "INTRINSIC HARM-WANTING EVIL" →

EVIL from SADISM-Agents → they have MIS-ALIGNED INCENTIVES with EVERYONE ELSE.

3. "INSTRUMENTALLY HARM-WANTING EVIL" →

EVIL from OUTCOME-NEUTRAL PSYCHOPATHS with POTENTIALLY-MISALIGNED-INCENTIVES with EVERYONE-ELSE.



5. ( NOT-SELF-CHOSEN LIFE-SITUATIONS ) → ( InVoluntary Life-Situations ) → ( InVoluntaryness ) → ( InVoluntary Physical Phenomenas, Mechanisms & Processes ) →

( NSCLS ) → ( NOT-SELF-CHOSEN LIFE-SITUATIONS ) →

Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =

(Make It Be So that InVoluntary Situations No Longer Can Occur).

(Make It Be So that Not-Self-Chosen-Situations No Longer Can Occur).

(Make It Be So that any and all types of "Not-Self-Chosen-Situations" that are Caused by the Actions of Other Agents or Other Things → Make It Be So that this No Longer Can Occur).

(Make It Be So that any and all types of "Not-Self-Chosen-Situations" that are NOT Caused by the Actions of Other Agents or Other Things → Make It Be So that this No Longer Can Occur).


( TYPOLOGY ) of ( InVoluntary Not-Self-Chosen Life-Situations ) →

(1.) ( AGENT__ACTIONDOINGS_____ORIGINATION ) → "Not-Self-Chosen-Situations" that are CAUSED by the Actions of Other Agents or Other Things.

(2.) ( SELF__ACTIONDOINGS_____ORIGINATION ) → "Not-Self-Chosen Life-Situations" that are CAUSED by the Actions of the AGENT that is ONEs Own SELF.

(3.) ( NATURE__EVENTHAPPENINGS_____ORIGINATION ) → "Not-Self-Chosen-Situations" that are NOT CAUSED by the Actions of Other Agents or Other Things. / "FORCED to ENDURE a SET of Not-Self-Chosen-Situations that are being IMPOSED upon ones LifeWorld-BodyMind-System by AGENTICALLY-BEHAVEING-PHYSICAL-SYSTEMS".


( CLASSIFICATION / TAXONOMY / ORIGIN-CAUSE-DISTINCTION ) of ( InVoluntary Not-Self-Chosen Life-Situations ) →

(1.) ( AWARE ) Not-Self-Chosen-Situation → NSCS where the Victim is AWARE that they are subject to a Not-Self-Chosen-Situation.

(2.) ( UN-AWARE ) Not-Self-Chosen-Situation → NSCS where the Victim is UN-AWARE that they are subject to a Not-Self-Chosen-Situation.

(ΩΩΩΩ√√√) → RankOrdered List of WORTHYest (SOLUTION__PRODUCTS) to (INVENT & UNIVERSALIZE). (√√)

END of all DYSTOPIAs :



 (1.)  *DYSTOPIA → DYSTOPIAN SITUATIONs and DYSTOPIAN RISKs*  →   
DYSTOPIA is any REALITY SITUATION where there is Above Zero Presence of Any of the Following Phenomena →
 InVoluntaryness, Violence, MindHarm, Evil, InVoluntary Suffering.  

the MORE Presence and Probability there is of Any of these 5x Phenomena, the MORE Dystopian it is. 

the Presence and Probability of InVoluntaryness is Number 1 Worst. 
the Presence and Probability of Violence is Number 2 Worst. 
the Presence and Probability of MindHarm is Number 3 Worst. 
the Presence and Probability of Evil is Number 4 Worst. 
the Presence and Probability of InVoluntary Suffering is Number 5 Worst. 


DYSTOPIA = DYSTOPIA is a SITUATION where there is Above Zero Presence of Any of the Following Phenomena →  Violence, MindHarm, Evil, Suffering, InVoluntaryness. 

the More there is of Violence, the More there is a Dystopian Situation. 
the Goal Priority is to make our Reality Situation to be as Least Dystopian as is possible.

Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =   
(Make It Be So that there is Zero Presence of Any of the Following Phenomena → Violence, MindHarm, Evil, Suffering, InVoluntaryness).





(2.)  *VIOLENCE / BODY-HARMing* →     
Body-Harming / Physical Attack Harming / Violence / Physical Violence / Violent Attack Actions. 

 Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =  
(Make It Be So that it is physically Impossible to to do Body-Harming Violent Actions to Other Persons → 
Violent Actions includes but is not ncessarily limited to →  
Murder, Torture, Rape, Slavery, Imprisonment, Kidnapping, Endangerment, Slavery, and Threat-Makeing to do any of these Body-Harming Violent Actions towards anyone)  →  

(Make It Be So that No one and No thing can do these types of Action-Doing-Processes to anyone ever). 
(Make It Be So that No One can ever be subjected to any of these types of Action-Doing-Processes). 



 (3.)  *PSYOPS / MIND-HARMing* →     
Mind-Harming / Mind-Control / Psyops / Manipulation / Indoctrination / Deception. 

 Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =  
(Make It Be So that it is physically Impossible for AnyOne or AnyThing to Suceed with the Attempted ActionDoingActivitys of →  
Mind-Harming someone, MindControlling someone, Manipulating someone, Indoctrinating someone, Psyopsing someone, Deceiveing someone, Bullying someone, Intimidating someone). 
(Make It Be So that No one and No thing can do these types of Action-Doing-Processes to anyone ever). 
(Make It Be So that No One can ever be subjected to any of these types of Action-Doing-Processes). 



 (6.) *INVOLUNTARY SUFFERING* →    
InVoluntary Suffering. 

 Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =   
(Make Suffering Optional). 
(Make It Be So that Suffering is Optional for the Individual who Experiences the Suffering). 
(Make It Be So that Anyone can Choose to Not Suffer At All). 
(Make It Be So that Anyone can Choose to Reduce any specific Type of Suffering by any specific Amount). 
(Make It Be So that Anyone can Choose to PreSelect a Default-Mode of Not Experienceing specific types of Suffering in specific Amounts in response to Externally Originating Stimuli and Internally Originating Stimuli). 
(Make It Be So that Anyone can Choose to PreSelect a Default-Mode of Not Experienceing specific types of Suffering in specific Amounts in response to Externally Originating Stimuli and Internally Originating Stimuli). 
(Make It Be So that Anyone can CHOOSE AMONGst Multiple Different "Preference-Profiles" that they can Switch Amongst at any time). 
(Make It Be So that Anyone can CHOOSE to have one such "Preference-Profile" to automatically be Activated upon the Happening of PreSpecified External or Internal Stimuli becoming present). 
(Make It Be So that Anyone can CHOOSE a "Maximum Limit upon Suffering that is Possible to Experience", where one would Automatically have had ones Suffering to be either Removed Entirely, or, to be Reduced by a Significant Amount that is Enough to make oneself Able to Make an Enlightened Choice about wether or not to Modify ones Suffering further Down). 


(4.)  *EVIL* →     
Evil / Evilness / Evil-Being / Evil-Wanting / Evil-Doing. 

 Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =  
(Make It Be So that Nobody Chooses to Continue to Be Evil). 
(Make It Be So that Nobody Wishes to Want Evil). 
(Make It Be So that Nobody Wishes to Do Evil). 
(Make It Be So that No Thing and Nobody has an INTRINSIC GOAL or an INTRINSIC PREFERENCE towards CAUSEING HARM onto any type of  Consciousness-Experienceing-Physical-System or Morally-CareWorthy-Physical-System). 
(Make It Be So that No Thing and Nobody has a Meta-Level Action-Doing-Policy that Permits doing Body-Harming and Mind-Harming Action-Doing-Practices towards any type of Consciousness-Experienceing-Physical-System or Morally-CareWorthy-Physical-System). 
(Make It Be So that No Thing and Nobody is Enacting any types of Action-Doing-Practices of Body-Harming or Mind-Harming, outside the context of such Action-Doing-Practices being Enacted in Self-Defence and outside the context of such Action-Doing-Practices being Enacted as a Response to a Conflict-Provocation that was Started by an Agentically-Behaveing-Physical-System that is not oneself). 
(Make It Be So that No Thing and Nobody has an INTRINSIC GOAL or an INTRINSIC PREFERENCE or an INTRINSIC WANTING-TO-BE-DOING-X-TYPES-OF-EVIL-ACTIONS). 


TYPOLOGY of WORST TYPES of EVIL → SPECIFICATION of WHAT the PHENOMENA of ( EVIL ) is →

1. "DYSTOPIAN HARM-WANTING EVIL" →

EVIL from DICTATOR-SADIST-WANTING-TO-HARM-EVERYONE-Agents.


2. "INTRINSIC HARM-WANTING EVIL" →

EVIL from SADISM-Agents → they have MIS-ALIGNED INCENTIVES with EVERYONE ELSE.


3. "INSTRUMENTALLY HARM-WANTING EVIL" →

EVIL from OUTCOME-NEUTRAL PSYCHOPATHS with POTENTIALLY-MISALIGNED-INCENTIVES with EVERYONE-ELSE.








5. ( NOT-SELF-CHOSEN LIFE-SITUATIONS ) → ( InVoluntary Life-Situations ) → ( InVoluntaryness ) → ( InVoluntary Physical Phenomenas, Mechanisms & Processes ) →
( NSCLS ) → ( NOT-SELF-CHOSEN LIFE-SITUATIONS ) →


 Solution-Request + Success-Criteria for an Ideal Solution =  
(Make It Be So that InVoluntary Situations No Longer Can Occur). 
(Make It Be So that Not-Self-Chosen-Situations No Longer Can Occur). 
(Make It Be So that any and all types of "Not-Self-Chosen-Situations" that are Caused by the Actions of Other Agents or Other Things →  Make It Be So that this No Longer Can Occur). 
(Make It Be So that any and all types of "Not-Self-Chosen-Situations" that are NOT Caused by the Actions of Other Agents or Other Things →  Make It Be So that this No Longer Can Occur). 

( TYPOLOGY ) of ( InVoluntary Not-Self-Chosen Life-Situations ) →

(1.) ( AGENT__ACTIONDOINGS_____ORIGINATION ) → "Not-Self-Chosen-Situations" that are CAUSED by the Actions of Other Agents or Other Things.

(2.) ( SELF__ACTIONDOINGS_____ORIGINATION ) → "Not-Self-Chosen Life-Situations" that are CAUSED by the Actions of the AGENT that is ONEs Own SELF.

(3.) ( NATURE__EVENTHAPPENINGS_____ORIGINATION ) → "Not-Self-Chosen-Situations" that are NOT CAUSED by the Actions of Other Agents or Other Things. / "FORCED to ENDURE a SET of Not-Self-Chosen-Situations that are being IMPOSED upon ones LifeWorld-BodyMind-System by AGENTICALLY-BEHAVEING-PHYSICAL-SYSTEMS".



( CLASSIFICATION / TAXONOMY / ORIGIN-CAUSE-DISTINCTION ) of ( InVoluntary Not-Self-Chosen Life-Situations ) →

(1.) ( AWARE ) Not-Self-Chosen-Situation → NSCS where the Victim is AWARE that they are subject to a Not-Self-Chosen-Situation.
